attributes.additional_details: Let Y10/11 back into the classroom!!
attributes.background: Year 10/11 need to be allowed back into the classroom as we are the most vital year groups right now and we have such little time to turn it all around! It’s our futures at risk...

rejection.details:
Under the Government's roadmap out of lockdown, all children and students will return to face-to-face education in schools and colleges from 8 March.
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-response-spring-2021/covid-19-response-spring-2021-summary

If there are specific changes to the schools reopening plan you would like to see, you could start a new petition calling for those changes.
